backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing files, components, and test IDs for generating an Android release APK.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like text containing prewritten summaries of various frontend source files.
frontend/ANDROID_RELEASE.md: Guide describing prerequisites and steps for building a Phoenix Boutique Android release APK.
frontend/android/keystore.properties.exa: Example keystore properties file showing required fields for Android release signing.
frontend/android/keystores/README.md: README explaining keystore storage, security warnings, and keystore generation for release signing.
frontend/build-outputs/.gitkeep: Placeholder file to keep the build-outputs directory in version control.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining theme variables and dark mode settings, plus base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/scripts/build-android-release-a: Shell script that builds the release APK, syncs Capacitor, and copies the final APK to build-outputs.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App root initializing offline DB, then rendering NavigationProvider and AppShell.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login, logout, and state.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrdersLiveQuery.ts: React Query hooks for live-updating all, recent, and single orders using IndexedDB change events.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and print‑specific styles.
frontend/src/layout/AppShell.tsx: App layout component rendering header, active screen content, and bottom navigation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/navigation/BottomNav.tsx: Bottom navigation bar enabling screen switches for dashboard, new order, and orders list.
frontend/src/navigation/NavigationProvid: Navigation context handling current screen, navigation actions, and selected order state.
frontend/src/screens/AuditAccountsScreen: Audit and accounts view providing date filters and computed financial metrics based on orders.
frontend/src/screens/DashboardScreen.tsx: Dashboard displaying order metrics and recent orders with navigation to order details.
frontend/src/screens/EditOrderScreen.tsx: Order editing form that loads an order, manages pricing logic, validates inputs, and saves updates.
frontend/src/screens/NewOrderScreen.tsx: Form UI for creating a new order with validation, price calculations, and submission to createOrder.
Displays detailed information for a selected order with status badges and a payment update dialog.
frontend/src/screens/OrdersListScreen.ts: Lists all orders with status indicators and navigates to order details or reports.
frontend/src/screens/PrintableAuditSumma: Generates a printable weekly and monthly audit summary with totals and order breakdowns.
frontend/src/screens/PrintableSummaryScr: Provides a printable view of today's and this week's orders with delivery details.
frontend/src/screens/ReportsScreen.tsx: Offers export options for multiple order ranges and navigation to printable summary and audit views.
frontend/src/screens/UpdatePaymentDialog: React dialog for updating an order’s payment, handling validation, previews, history entries, and saving via updateOrderPayment.
Provides date‑filtered audit calculations for orders, including revenue, collected amounts, outstanding totals, and status counts.
frontend/src/services/currencyFormat.ts: Utility functions to format numbers as INR currency with or without decimals, handling invalid inputs safely.
frontend/src/services/localDb.ts: IndexedDB adapter for offline order storage with schema migrations and basic read/write helpers.
frontend/src/services/offlineInit.ts: Initializes offline persistence by setting up IndexedDB with error handling.
frontend/src/services/orderCsvExport.ts: Generates CSV strings for full order exports and audit exports and triggers browser downloads.
frontend/src/services/orderQueries.ts: Provides date‑based utilities and functions to compute dashboard metrics like deliveries due and pending counts.
frontend/src/services/ordersRepository.t: IndexedDB order repository with normalization logic and helpers to read all orders, recent orders, and single orders.
frontend/src/services/paymentCalculation: Utility functions for calculating balance, deriving payment status, and validating pricing fields.
frontend/src/shared/ui/ScreenTitle.tsx: Simple React component that renders a styled section title.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project state file describing app scope, architecture, existing features, and known issues.
